attributes.action: Address the extortionate ticket prices of rail travel in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government wishes to combat climate change by reducing air travel and getting less cars on the road they need to make the costs of public transport accessible to all.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cheap-trains/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
